text: @realDonaldTrump You do appear to be getting beaten rather badly..🤣😅 Perhaps your coronavirus fail,the economy in the shitter,the country on fire,while you piss your pants hiding/carrying out bunker inspections & America a laughing stock could have something to do with it,honey....??..🤗🇺🇸 https://t.co/17pvM0khJw
